name: apel.apel-ssm
description: Secure Stomp Messenger (SSM) is designed to simply send messages using the STOMP protocol. Messages are signed and may be encrypted during transit. Persistent queues should be used to guarantee delivery.
releaseNotes: Added a check that certificates have not expired before starting SSM. SSL errors now propagated out properly and saved for received messages. Trimmed down the number of log messages generated for receivers. Added python-devel build requirement for non fedora-packager OSs (CentOS).
